title: Angel Devil
description: Lucio, the angelic monk at the local monastery, might just be a fun diversion, but Ned takes care of his toys. When Lucioâ€™s chance at Oxford is threatened by the Sacrist, Ned knows what to do.Angel. Devil. Ned's heard it all before, and those who see him as the latter always get what they deserve.This is a 9400 word short story that takes place prior to Thrall.
author: Julie Mannino
